parameter.name: config_1_2
parameter.label: 1: IN1 Alarm Cancellation Delay
parameter.description: Input I alarm cancellation delay. Additional delay after an alarm from input IN1 has ceased. The parameter allows you to specify additional time, after which the input no. 1 alarm is cancelled once its violation has ceased.

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: IN2 Alarm Cancellation Delay
parameter.description: Input 2 alarm cancellation delay. Additional delay after an alarm from input IN2 has ceased. The parameter allows you to specify additional time, after which the input no. 2 alarm is cancelled once its violation has ceased.

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Type of input no. 1
parameter.description: Type of input no. 1, what the input 1 will report if no contact is made

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Type of input no. 2
parameter.description: Type of input no. 2, what the input 2 will report if no contact is made

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Type of transmitted control frame for association group 1
parameter.description: Type of transmitted control frame for association group 1, activated via input IN1. The parameter allows to specify the type of alarm frame or to force transmission of control commands (BASIC_SET)

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Type of transmitted control frame for association group 2
parameter.description: Type of transmitted control frame for association group 2, activated via input IN2. The parameter allows to specify the type of alarm frame or to force transmission of control commands (BASIC_SET)

parameter.label: 10: Interval between successive readings of temperature sensors
parameter.description: Interval between successive readings of temperature from all sensors connected to the device in seconds. Note: taking temperature readings from the sensor does not result in sending a temperature condition report to the central hub.
